name: X.Drake
text: Activate: Main You may rest this character: If the number of your life cards is less than or equal to the number of your opponent's life cards, rest up to one of your opponent's characters with a cost of 4 or less.

effect.text: You may rest this character: If the number of your life cards is less than or equal to the number of your opponent's life cards, rest up to one of your opponent's characters with a cost of 4 or less.
